Class DMSHelper

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.BaseHelper
us.mn.state.dot.tms.DMSHelper
public class DMSHelper extends BaseHelper
Helper class for DMS. Used on the client and server.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter

    • createRasterBuilder

      Create a raster builder for a DMS

    • buildMsgText

      public static String buildMsgText(DMS dms)
      Return a single string which is formated to be readable by the user and contains all sign message lines on the specified DMS.
      Parameters:
      dms - The DMS containing the message.
      Returns:
      Text of message on the DMS.

    • ignoreFilter

      public static MultiString ignoreFilter(MultiString ms)
      Filter the specified multi. If certain keywords are present then a blank multi is returned. The keywords indicate no text is available for the associated bitmap.
      Returns:
      A blank multi if the argument multi flags no text, else the specified multi.

    • ignoreLineFilter

      public static boolean ignoreLineFilter(String line)
      Return true if the specified message line should be ignored. By convention, a line begining and ending with an underscore is to be ignored. IRIS assumes non-blank DMS messages have both a bitmap and multistring, which is not the case for all DMS protocols.

    • createBitmaps

      public static BitmapGraphic[] createBitmaps(DMS dms, String ms) throws InvalidMsgException
      Create bitmap graphics for all pages of a specified DMS.
      Parameters:
      dms - The sign.
      ms - Message MULTI string.
      Returns:
      Array of bitmap graphics for the sign, or null.
      Throws:
      InvalidMsgException - if MULTI string is invalid.

    • getPageOne

      public static RasterGraphic getPageOne(DMS dms)
      Get the current raster graphic for page one of the specified DMS.
      Parameters:
      dms - The sign.
      Returns:
      RasterGraphic for page one, or null on error.

    • createPageOne

      public static RasterGraphic createPageOne(DMS dms, String multi)
      Create the page one raster graphic for a DMS with a MULTI string.
      Parameters:
      dms - The sign.
      multi - MULTI string.
      Returns:
      RasterGraphic for page one, or null on error.
